definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Recently theories of multiple modernities have emphasized the multiple features of modernity.
sentences.chinese: 多元现代性“理论问世后开始强调现代性的多种形式。

sentences.english: Recently theories of multiple modernities have emphasized the multiple features of modernity.
sentences.chinese: 多元现代性“理论问世后开始强调现代性的多种形式。

sentences.english: While modernity makes greater progress, it also brings with it a lot of malaises.
sentences.chinese: 现代性取得了巨大成就的同时，也带了诸多的隐忧。

sentences.english: These two contestations supplement each other, and they are the way to build our native modernity.
sentences.chinese: 这两个主张是中国生成本土现代性的相辅相成的进路。

sentences.english: This is one of the major features of the modernity of his aesthetic educational psyche.
sentences.chinese: 这是其美育观现代性的重要体现之一。

sentences.english: Human nature in its modernity is the deep social root for most ecological crisis.
sentences.chinese: 现代性的人性是生态危机的深刻根源。

sentences.english: Simmel is considered to be the first sociologist who starts to research modernity.
sentences.chinese: 齐美尔被认为是研究现代性的第一位社会学家。

sentences.english: The second chapter analysed several modernity idea subjects of Gide's works.
sentences.chinese: 第二章解析纪德作品中的现代性思想主题。

sentences.english: Though unsystematic, Lin Huiyin's fiction theory is of great modernity.
sentences.chinese: 林徽因的小说理论虽然零散，却十分具有现代性。

sentences.english: I create works in the purpose of the modern monochrome combining these characters.
sentences.chinese: 我以融合这些特点的现代性单色画为目标而创作作品。

sentences.english: Since the modern times, China has been gyrating in the whirlpool of modernity.
sentences.chinese: 近代以来，整个中国旋转在现代性漩涡中。

sentences.english: The introduction put emphasis on clearing the tation of modernity.
sentences.chinese: 引言重在廓清“现代性”的概念。

sentences.english: In this paper, considered that the code in the consumer era of modern features.
sentences.chinese: 本论文认为，广告符码在消费时代具有了现代性特征。

sentences.english: Chapter three is an analysis of the modernity in Xiandai.
sentences.chinese: 论文第三章旨在探索《现代》文学实践中的现代性。

sentences.english: The time-space dimension of cultural modernity.
sentences.chinese: 文化现代性的时空维度。

sentences.english: The historical background of Chinese literary theory is the introduction of Western modernity into China in the last few decades of the 20th century.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪晚期中国文论的历史背景是现代性西学东渐。
